title: Looking for team members for ranked or normals, must be willing to just have fun and not flame etc.
body:
Gonna keep it simple, looking for a few guys or gals to play with regularly, as I'm on every day or so. If you're active and want to work as a team, maybe even form a ranked team later on and practice, etc then hit me up. Message me through in game chat, any friends requests sent I'll accept. IGN: MyDadsDumbFace

Usually on between late morning to late night, depends. Hit me up.
GLHF

replies.body:
I cant add atm, but i will warn, i do flame
at myself for being retarded
I'll add you, we can chat in game
